title: Geological Context
description: Geological information, such as stratigraphy, that qualifies a region or place.

properties.name: bed
properties.description: The full name of the lithostratigraphic bed from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: earliestAgeOrLowestStage
properties.description: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic age or lowest chronostratigraphic stage attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected

properties.name: earliestEonOrLowestEonothem
properties.description: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic eon or lowest chrono-stratigraphic eonothem or the informal name (Precambrian) attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: earliestEpochOrLowestSeries
properties.description: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic epoch or lowest chronostratigraphic series attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: earliestEraOrLowestErathem
properties.description: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic era or lowest chronostratigraphic erathem attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: earliestPeriodOrLowestSystem
properties.description: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic period or lowest chronostratigraphic system attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: formation
properties.description: The full name of the lithostratigraphic formation from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: group
properties.description: The full name of the lithostratigraphic group from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: hasIdentifier
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

properties.name: hasMeasurementOrFact
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.

properties.name: hasReference
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

properties.name: latestAgeOrHighestStage
properties.description: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic age or highest chronostratigraphic stage attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: latestEonOrHighestEonothem
properties.description: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic eon or highest chrono-stratigraphic eonothem or the informal name (Precambrian) attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: latestEpochOrHighestSeries
properties.description: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic epoch or highest chronostratigraphic series attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: latestEraOrHighestErathem
properties.description: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic era or highest chronostratigraphic erathem attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: latestPeriodOrHighestSystem
properties.description: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic period or highest chronostratigraphic system attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

properties.name: member
properties.description: The full name of the lithostratigraphic member from which the cataloged item was collected.
